alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 10 at 11:03PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT THURSDAY THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... ...FLOOD WATCH HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of eastern Nevada, including the following county, White Pine County. * WHEN...From 11 AM PDT Thursday through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood The Flash Flood Watch has expired for a portion of eastern Nevada, including the following county, White Pine County. The flash flooding threat has ended. Therefore, the Flash Flood Watch has expired.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
